channel.title: Server WAS Online
channel.description: Okay...on Monday, I left my server on all day for my friends in Britain to play while I was at school, etc. Well, when I got home, I exited out of it. Before I did that, my RuneLocus status checker said it was ONLINE. Later, I try to put it online...it doesn't work. The server says it's online, but the server won't GO online. My port is open, I portforwarded, etc. Everything worked before, but now it won't. I do not know the cause of this. I've tried every source I have ; none of them work. I did not change anything. Help

item.title: Server WAS Online
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:9, topic:338617”][quote author=Impious Lols link=topic=435005.msg3194934#msg3194934 date=1272683457]
I checked my router and my modem and both of them are fine -.- still doesn’t work. I’ve had this problem for a week -.- I have Teamviewer, AIM, and Skype
[/quote]

Check all firewalls etc. If you are running a Windows OS then there are a lot of useless and irritating security features you might have to disable.[/quote]Firewall is fine (port 43594 is still enabled)

Read full topic

item.title: Server WAS Online
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Impious Lols:

I checked my router and my modem and both of them are fine -.- still doesn’t work. I’ve had this problem for a week -.- I have Teamviewer, AIM, and Skype

Check all firewalls etc. If you are running a Windows OS then there are a lot of useless and irritating security features you might have to disable.

Read full topic

item.title: Server WAS Online
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

ok i just had this problem like literally 10 mins ago. go back into your router and double check your ports and make sure they are open. then apply the changes to your router and restart your server thats what i did and now mines wokring fine again

Read full topic

item.title: Server WAS Online
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

It prob takes acouple minutes for it to check, I know MoparScape’s checks every hour or something, and RL checks every 5 minutes. It doesn’t check every 3 seconds, so just turn it on and give it some time bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Server WAS Online

item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Okay…on Monday, I left my server on all day for my friends in Britain to play while I was at school, etc. Well, when I got home, I exited out of it. Before I did that, my RuneLocus status checker said it was ONLINE. Later, I try to put it online…it doesn’t work. The server says it’s online, but the server won’t GO online. My port is open, I portforwarded, etc. Everything worked before, but now it won’t. I do not know the cause of this. I’ve tried every source I have ; none of them work. I did not change anything.
